metadata.title: CVE-2023-22320 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: OpenAM Web Policy Agent (OpenAM Consortium Edition) provided by OpenAMConsortium parses URLs improperly, leading to a path traversalvulnerability(CWE-22). Furthermore, a crafted URL may be evaluatedincorrectly.

criterions.comment: openam: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
